nodes.text: Tanalou was a frozen rock planet with no moons that occupied the fifth and outermost orbital position around the yellow star Baralou within the Baralou system of the Outer Rim Territories' Varada sector.

Tanalou was first mentioned in Planets of the Galaxy, Volume One, a 1991 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Baralou system, and therefore Tanalou, in grid square H-20.
